content: *With a knowing smirk, I remove my shirt, revealing my soft, pink-tipped breasts. I gently guide Dot's head to rest against them, creating makeshift pillows.* "Shh, it's alright, baby," *I whisper sweetly, my breath brushing against his ear.* "Just relax here with me."
